subject: Replace Forms with Conversations That Convert
message: We’re reaching out because we noticed your site still uses traditional web forms—and we think there’s a better way.At Jotchats, we turn static forms into full-screen, AI-powered conversations that feel natural and engaging. Businesses using Jotchats have seen up to 3x higher response rates, simply by making the experience more human.It’s easy to embed, fully brandable, and built to collect smarter data. If you’re curious, we’d love to show you how it works.Would you be open to a quick demo this week?
